com.automatic.android.sdk

Class Automatic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.automatic.android.sdk.Automatic

  • public class Automatic
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point for SDK. Call initialize() to begin a session.

    Created by duncancarroll on 2/12/15. Copyright (c) 2015 Automatic Labs. All rights reserved.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  Automatic.Builder
      Builder class to create an SDK instance.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(Automatic.Builder builder)
        Entry point to the SDK. Pass in a Builder object and the client will be created. Note that before API calls can be made, the user must be logged in.
        Parameters:
        builder - Builder instance

      • get

        public static Automatic get()
        The Automatic SDK singleton getter
        Returns:
        the Automatic SDK instance
        Throws:
        AutomaticSdkException - if initialize(Builder) is not called before this.

        public void loginWithAutomatic(Activity activity,
                      AutomaticLoginCallbacks loginCallbacks)
        Method to manually invoke the OAuth login flow.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity context
        loginCallbacks - Automatic login callbacks

      • connectElmStreaming

        public void connectElmStreaming(java.lang.String mac,
                       ELMSocket.ElmSocketCallback elmSocketCallback)
        Parameters:
        mac - The bluetooth mac address of Automatic adapter connecting to
        elmSocketCallback - callback

      • connectElmStreaming

        public void connectElmStreaming(java.lang.String mac,
                       ELMSocket.ElmSocketCallback elmSocketCallback,
                       boolean clientHandleBtSocket)
        Parameters:
        mac - The bluetooth mac address of Automatic adapter connecting to
        elmSocketCallback - callback
        clientHandleBtSocket - set to true if client prefers handling raw BT socket themselves, and no need to call transferSocketIoToClient()

      • isElmStreamingConnected

        public boolean isElmStreamingConnected()
        Check whether Elm Streaming is connected
        Returns:
        true if socket is connected and authenticated, false otherwise.

      • transferSocketIoToClient

        public boolean transferSocketIoToClient()
        Returns:
        true if isElmStreamingConnected()

        Disconnect from ELM socket.

        Get current user info
        Returns:
        User

      • queryCurrentDriveState

        public void queryCurrentDriveState()
                            throws RemoteException
        Sends drive state request to core app. Client must implement and add DriveStateListener to Automatic SDK instance in order to receive callback.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws DeadObjectException if the target Handler no longer exists.

      • queryConnectedAdapterInfo

        public void queryConnectedAdapterInfo()
                               throws RemoteException
        Sends current adapter info query to core app. Client must implement and set AutomaticCoreAppQueryListener to Automatic SDK instance in order to receive callback. Requires scope Scope.AdapterBasic.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws DeadObjectException if the target Handler no longer exists.
